title: Next.js demo: Anonymous + Paystack plugin
description: Create a working Next.js example demo that uses Better Auth + anonymous plugin + better-auth-paystack plugin. Include UI + scripts to exercise transaction initialize/verify, subscription list-local/disable/enable, webhook signature verification, and linking anonymous -> email account.

comments.author: alexasomba
comments.text: Implemented Next.js demo wiring: server now includes Better Auth anonymous plugin + Paystack plugin (createCustomerOnSignUp enabled), client includes anonymousClient + paystackClient with credentials. Added interactive demo UI on / to exercise signIn.anonymous, email sign-up/sign-in, transaction initialize/verify, subscription list/disable/enable, and a demo server route to send signed Paystack webhooks. Typecheck + unit tests + integration test pass.

comments.author: alexasomba
comments.text: Removed demo-only webhook signer route and UI. Real webhook verification remains at POST /api/auth/paystack/webhook and is intended to be called by Paystack (not from the browser). Typecheck + tests still pass.

comments.author: alexasomba
comments.text: Tweaked demo realism: Paystack customer creation on sign-up is now optional via PAYSTACK_CREATE_CUSTOMER_ON_SIGNUP (default off) so sign-up/login + transactions/subscriptions work even if customer creation isn't configured. Updated .env.example, README, and UI copy. Tests pass.
